languages.text: "Нет, Адальберт верил в то же, во что верю я. И был рад принести в жертву себя, так же, как я рад. Вы были противны ему, и я горд, что он смог обратить себя в еще один удар по вашей убогой власти".
"No, Adalbert believed in what I believe. He was just as willing to sacrifice himself as I am. You disgusted him, and I am proud that he was able to deal such a blow against your paltry authority."
languages.original_text: "Нет, Адальберт верил в то же, во что верю я. И был рад принести в жертву себя, так же, как я рад. Вы были противны ему, и я горд, что он смог обратить себя в еще один удар по вашей убогой власти".

traits.locale_text: "No, Adalbert believed what I believe. And was as happy to sacrifice himself as I am. You were repugnant to him, and I am proud that he was able to turn himself into another blow against your wretched authority."

"No, Adalbert believed what I believe. And was as happy to sacrifice himself as I am. You were repugnant to him, and I am proud that he was able to turn himself into another blow against your wretched authority."

"No, Adalbert believed what I believe. He was just as willing to sacrifice himself as I am. You were repugnant to him, and I am proud that he was able to deal such a blow against your wretched authority."

"No, Adalbert believed what I believe. He was just as willing to sacrifice himself as I am. You were repugnant to him, and I am proud that he was able to deal such a blow against your wretched authority."
"No, Adalbert believed in what I believe. He was just as willing to sacrifice himself as I am. You disgusted him, and I am proud that he was able to deal such a blow against your paltry authority."
"No, Adalbert believed in what I believe. He was just as willing to sacrifice himself as I am. You disgusted him, and I am proud that he was able to deal such a blow against your paltry authority."

languages.text: "Nein, Adalbert hat an dasselbe geglaubt wie ich. Er war ebenso bereit, sich zu opfern, wie ich es bin. Ihr habt ihn angewidert, und ich bin stolz, dass er einen derartigen Schlag gegen Eure schäbige Autorität führen konnte."
languages.original_text: "No, Adalbert believed in what I believe. He was just as willing to sacrifice himself as I am. You disgusted him, and I am proud that he was able to deal such a blow against your paltry authority."

traits.locale_text: "Nein, Adalbert hat an dasselbe geglaubt wie ich. Er war ebenso bereit, sich zu opfern, wie ich es bin. Ihr habt ihn angewidert, und ich bin stolz, dass er einen derartigen Schlag gegen Eure schäbige Autorität führen konnte."

languages.text: «No, Adalbert creía en lo mismo que yo. Estaba tan dispuesto a sacrificarse como yo. Le repugnabas, y me enorgullece que haya conseguido dar un golpe tan impactante contra tu miserable autoridad».
languages.original_text: "No, Adalbert believed in what I believe. He was just as willing to sacrifice himself as I am. You disgusted him, and I am proud that he was able to deal such a blow against your paltry authority."

traits.locale_text: «No, Adalbert creía en lo mismo que yo. Estaba tan dispuesto a sacrificarse como yo. Le repugnabas, y me enorgullece que haya conseguido dar un golpe tan impactante contra tu miserable autoridad».

languages.text: 「いや、アダルバートは私が信じるものを信じていた。私と同じく自己犠牲を厭わない男だ。お前にうんざりしてたのさ。彼がお前のちっぽけな権威にあれほどの打撃を与えたことを誇りに思うよ」
languages.original_text: "No, Adalbert believed in what I believe. He was just as willing to sacrifice himself as I am. You disgusted him, and I am proud that he was able to deal such a blow against your paltry authority."

traits.locale_text: 「いや、アダルバートは私が信じるものを信じていた。私と同じく自己犠牲を厭わない男だ。お前にうんざりしてたのさ。彼がお前のちっぽけな権威にあれほどの打撃を与えたことを誇りに思うよ」

languages.text: “不，阿达伯特与我坚守同样的信仰，他和我一样愿意为了正义献身。你令他厌恶不已，而他成功地打击了你那脆弱的权威，我为他感到骄傲。”
languages.original_text: "No, Adalbert believed in what I believe. He was just as willing to sacrifice himself as I am. You disgusted him, and I am proud that he was able to deal such a blow against your paltry authority."

traits.locale_text: “不，阿达伯特与我坚守同样的信仰，他和我一样愿意为了正义献身。你令他厌恶不已，而他成功地打击了你那脆弱的权威，我为他感到骄傲。”

languages.text: « Non, Adalbert partageait les mêmes aspirations. Il était juste tout aussi déterminé que moi à se sacrifier. Vous lui inspiriez du dégoût, et je suis fier qu'il ait pu porter un tel coup à votre misérable autorité. »
languages.original_text: "No, Adalbert believed in what I believe. He was just as willing to sacrifice himself as I am. You disgusted him, and I am proud that he was able to deal such a blow against your paltry authority."

traits.locale_text: « Non, Adalbert partageait les mêmes aspirations. Il était juste tout aussi déterminé que moi à se sacrifier. Vous lui inspiriez du dégoût, et je suis fier qu'il ait pu porter un tel coup à votre misérable autorité. »

languages.text: "Hayır. Adalbert, ben neye inanıyorsam ona inanırdı. O da tıpkı benim gibi kendini feda etmeye hazırdı. Senden iğrenirdi. Aşağılık otoritene karşı böylesine bir darbe indirebilmesinden dolayı onunla gurur duyuyorum."
languages.original_text: "No, Adalbert believed in what I believe. He was just as willing to sacrifice himself as I am. You disgusted him, and I am proud that he was able to deal such a blow against your paltry authority."
